record.id: field.name="query.type" and file.name="validity" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: query.type
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: Indicates whether to validate (v) or do a duplicate check (d) against the specified table.

detail.detail: A Query Type of v causes the validity routine to run the Val query against a specified table. If the query finds no records, the validity routine considers it an error condition. If the query finds many records, it prompts the operator to select a valid record from the record list produced by running the Select query against the table.

A Query Type of d causes the validity routine to run the Val query against a specified table. If the query finds one record, the validity routine considers it a potential error condition. It issues the Val Error Msg to the operator and processing continues to the next field. The validity routine does not prompt the operator to correct data.
